Name: TVs: The Awakening
About the game: What happens when a TV wakes up and finds himself in an illusional world, where the facts become a crazy dream, TVs is a platformer game combining intense action with challenging puzzles and fight the scary bosses. game Play TVs is a single player platformer game, focuses on a journey of a tv character called “u” who needs to drive his way on strange events to solve mysterious puzzles till he finds the truth. unknown character appears to the player on the televisions and radios in the game environment and speaks to the player to guide him. The game requires running, jumping, crouching, hanging and most important timing skills to pass the puzzles and need to pay attention to the small details where you may find a clue to move forward.
